column1: aizawashoutah 161055345760 "2017-05-25 12:07:31 GMT" http://aizawashoutah.tumblr.com/post/161055345760/i-cant-sleep-rn-so-lets-talk-about-all-the "otayuri-is-my-jam: - The whole skating routine is so punk rock
column3: and so Yuri. He’s really expressing himself
column5: and it’s gorgeous and mesmerizing. - But when you figure all of that
column6: and then add in that he’s skating to Otabek’s music – like Beka is his inspiration
column7: someone who synergizes with him creatively
column9: from the outfits to the choreography
column10: is their joint creation – I’m just like *clutches chest* *wheezes profusely* - There’s so many more dynamics to Yuri and Otabek’s relationship and interactions now than were in the show. I don’t have enough capacity for coherent thought right now to break them down
column11: and that should probably wait for a full scan to come out. But how wonderfully they work together
column13: and play off each other after like a WEEK of friendship is the stuff that shipper dreams are made of. - But for one thing
column14: they are both so cool and nonchalant about that whole sexy af performance
column15: that they have to be incredibly comfortable with each other to pull it off with such ease. - Everyone who thought Otabek was nothing but a quiet shy guy is IN FOR SOME SURPRISES WHOO BOY. I love him to bits either way – as the cool bad boy on a bike
column16: or as the super-cool club DJ
column17: or as the super-super-cool-super-extra-finger-lickin-good boy. But now he has quite a bit of depth
column18: and every new detail we learn just makes us love him more 👍 - It’s not that often that I’ve been part of a fandom that has allowed me to see my favorite ship become canon right before my eyes. This journey over the past several months has been so beyond awesome
column19: and for all its flaws the YOI fandom is really nothing short of amazing. I am quite certain that we made this happen by showing our support and love for Otayuri ever since that fateful day of Episode 10. - Finally
column20: now all the haters/anti-shippers can literally go suck it (and by “it” I mean Yuri’s index finger) ☝️☝️☝️👅👅👅 " False text

column1: aizawashoutah 161021239380 "2017-05-24 13:55:02 GMT" http://aizawashoutah.tumblr.com/post/161021239380/quotes "polyrhyme:  So I’m not really in the BSD fandom
column2: but I wrote this drabble awhile ago to emotionally compromise one of my best friends and after months of it collecting dust
column3: @sarasanddollar ordered me to post it. I hope you enjoy it ^w^ “I know it makes no difference to you
column4: but please become a good human being. Save the weak
column5: protect the orphaned. I suppose you don’t care for either justice or evil…but striving to be a better person is a wonderful thing” Who had said those words to him? Dazai can’t frankly remember. He’s tries his to wrack his brain to remember who had said  those  words to him but he shoots blanks every time. Literally. He puts the gun down
column6: then raises the gun to his temple
column7: finger slowly tugging the trigger. Dazai hears nothing
column8: looking down he realizes that the gun is on the floor. Bending down to pick it up
column9: he slowly stands back up and stretches his arms out gracefully. Red hair is what catches his attention. Maybe it was one of the members playing a prank on him. “No Longer Human.” muttered Dazai
column10: brown eyes widening when the red hair doesn’t transform. “No Longer Human.” he gritted out
column11: panic settling in when it still stood there. “You’re right Dazai
column12: I’m no longer human.” Red hair said. “Did you do like I asked you to?” “What are you talking about?“ “Become a good human being
column15: he steps back from the red hair. “WHO ARE YOU?” “You can’t remember me?” Red hair said sadly. “So you didn’t do as I asked of you? You seemed like the type of person to follow through with his word. It seems I was wrong.” " False text
